hero.title: Find Your Ideal Property
hero.subtitle: The best selection of properties in the area

about.title: Who We Are?
about.subtitle: About Us
about.description1: We are a professional real estate agency dedicated to providing exceptional service in buying, selling, and renting properties. With years of experience in the market, we help our clients find their perfect property.
about.description2: Our mission is to make the real estate process simple, transparent, and successful for everyone. We offer personalized attention and expert guidance throughout your real estate journey.

contactHome.title: Buy, Sell, or Rent?
contactHome.subtitle: We support you in the process of selling, buying, or renting your property. Request a professional real estate consultation.

properties.title: Properties
properties.subtitle: Here you will find all available properties
properties.adjustFilters: Try adjusting the filters to see more results

agents.title: Our Team
agents.subtitle: Ready to help you
agents.description: Our team of professionals is dedicated to helping you find the perfect property. With years of experience and deep knowledge of the local market.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive real estate solutions
services.introText: At RodcerState we offer a wide range of real estate services designed to meet all your needs. Our team of professionals is committed to providing you with the best experience in every transaction.

items.title: Buying and Selling
items.description: We help you find the perfect property or sell your property at the best market price.

items.title: Property Rental
items.description: We manage your property and find the best tenants for you.

items.title: Legal Advice
items.description: We have legal experts who will guide you through the entire buying or selling process.

items.title: Property Valuation
items.description: We perform professional appraisals to determine the real value of your property.

items.title: Real Estate Investment
items.description: We advise you on the best investment opportunities in the real estate market.

cta.title: Need Help With Your Property?
cta.text: Our team of experts is ready to help you. Contact us today.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: If you need more information about our available properties, contact us.
contact.description: Visit us at our offices, we will be happy to assist you personally. If you prefer, fill out the following form and we will gladly contact you shortly.
contact.success: Sent - Thank you for your message. We will contact you soon.

agentDetail.newsletterText: Sign up and receive exclusive information.
agentDetail.followText: Stay tuned for all new properties
agentDetail.noProperties: This agent currently has no assigned properties.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.subtitle: Learn about our history and values
aboutPage.storyText: Founded in 2010, RodcerState was born with the vision of transforming the local real estate market. What started as a small family office has become one of the most respected agencies in the region, thanks to our unwavering commitment to integrity and service excellence.
aboutPage.missionText: To provide comprehensive real estate solutions that exceed our clients' expectations through professional, ethical, and personalized service.
aboutPage.visionText: To be the leading real estate agency in the market, recognized for our innovation, human quality, and ability to make our clients' dreams come true.

values.integrityDesc: We act with honesty and transparency in every transaction.
values.excellenceDesc: We strive for perfection in every detail of our service.
values.innovationDesc: We use the latest technology to enhance the customer experience.
values.commitmentDesc: We are dedicated to the success and satisfaction of our clients.

cta.title: Ready to find your dream home?
